snippet.title: Kokoro no Pro - UPDATE TEASER (2024)
snippet.description:
** HELP US REACH OUR KICKSTARTER GOALS THROUGH 5/5/2024: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/empmaniac/kokoro-no-pro **

*PLAYABLE SECTION NOW AVAILABLE AT https://digitaleraentertainment.itch.io/knp !*

Originally presented at our booth during WrestleCon 2023, and with some visual enhancements to reflect the game's current state in 2024, this is the Update Teaser for our upcoming pro-wrestling themed Visual Novel project! (Still in DEEvelopment!)

Latest project info available at http://digitaleraentertainment.com/projects/kokoro-no-pro/ .

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SYNOPSIS: A bored third-year student in Japan's Shinchoku High School is looking to change his ways after having accomplished nothing throughout his high school career. By chance, he meets a mysterious masked girl who introduces him to the world of professional wrestling, which begins a year of his life that turns out to be as exciting as the ones portrayed in the squared circle...

A Visual Novel-anchored hybrid of dating sim and wrestling game (in its completed form; VN only for the demo+initial release) that is built around the theme of professional wrestling. Featuring a plot driven by a motley crew of teenage wrestlers who come together to find friendship, purpose...and possibly even love!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

KOKORO NO PRO MAIN STAFF:

Created/Main Scenario/Character Design/Conceptual+Additional Art/Demo Version Programming by: RJ Para (http://www.twitch.tv/rjpara)

Director/Lead Producer/Lead Writer/Lead Demo Version Programming by: Mario Bueno (http://www.mariobueno.com)

Character Sprites/CGs by: Larein (http://www.larein.com)
Backgrounds by: Keiraworks (http://keiraworks.com/)

Title Logo/Additional Art/Consultation by: Laura Kovalcin (http://www.http://illustratorlaura.com/)

Theme Music by: Michael Garrett Steele (https://soundcloud.com/steelegarrett), Nathaniel Chambers (https://soundcloud.com/bubblepipemedia), and Mario Bueno

Built in Ren'Py (Demo Ver.)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Like what you see? Enjoy podcasts, written content, and more at our site! (http://www.digitaleraentertainment.com)

Don't forget to visit our Discord (https://discord.gg/BbwJunD) for daily updates on content as well as exclusive previews and friendly DEEscussion!

Want to further support DEE Team? Check out our merch at our official shop! (https://merch.streamelements.com/digitaleraentertainment)

If you're in NYC and by Lower Manhattan, please check out Waypoint Cafe NYC (https://waypointgamer.com/), the home of our Esports/gaming podcast DEE CODE!
